job_title: Head of External Affairs in London, England
pros: If you're creative, and keen to try something then you will be supported 100%. Centre for Cities deeply values passion and an interest in the job more than anything else. Someone who is up for experimenting, learning and progressing would suit this small, dynamic team.
cons: If you prefer processes, and long strategies, this won't be the job for you. CFC is all about getting on with things, and likes to see action. It's a small team, and your work is very exposed, and this can understandably be stressful.
